Package evrp

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • evrp.Node
  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    The Node class represents a single node in the whole graph, and stores all the information needed about a single node

    • Constructor Summary

        y - represents the y coordinate of this node
        nodeType - represents the type of this node
        stationType - representas the type of the station (fast, slow, medium slow)

      • addSuccessor

        public void addSuccessor​(int destination,
                         double distance)
        Adds a successor to the list of successors of this node
        Parameters:
        destination - represents the succesor id
        distance - represents the euclidean distance from this node to the successor
